author: paralin
content: Hi all, released a libp2p-based (go) library & daemon for modular p2p comms, w/ flexible protobuf+yaml config. Supports transports, links, pubsub (NATS), quic-over-websocket, libp2p & drpc, crypto, simulations: https://github.com/aperturerobotics/bifrost (Go) - Feel free to reach out w/ any questions!
